name: RemoveRoleFromRestrictionQuery
description:
Removes a role from a Datadog restriction query.

Use this tool to delete a specific role from a restriction query in Datadog. Appropriate for situations where you need to manage access by modifying restriction queries.

parameters.name: restriction_query_id
parameters.description: The ID of the restriction query to remove the role from.

value_schema.description: The ID of the restriction query.

parameters.name: role_unique_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the role to be removed from the restriction query.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the role.

parameters.name: role_type
parameters.description: The type of the role, must be 'roles'.
